definitions.definition: cause (something) to pass on from one place or person to another.
examples: knowledge is transmitted from teacher to student
synonyms: circulate "the use of computers to transmit information"

definitions.definition: broadcast or send out (an electrical signal or a radio or television program).
examples: the program was transmitted on October 7
synonyms: televise "the program will be transmitted on Sunday"

definitions.definition: pass on (a disease or trait) to another.
allow (heat, light, sound, electricity, or other energy) to pass through a medium.
examples: the three bones transmit sound waves to the inner ear

definitions.definition: communicate or be a medium for (an idea or emotion).
examples: the theatrical gift of being able to transmit emotion
